third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Jerry is not someone to underestimate. He is a very unique style puller. If Ermes makes a mistake with his preparation, it may not be fixable during the match. Jerry deserves utmost respect.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Jerry's unique style could pose problems for Ermes if not properly prepared for.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Incredible, recently posted a back pressure world record at 92 kilos.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Learned from past experiences like the Kurdecha match.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Very strong, unique style that can be dangerous if underestimated.
Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Has beaten top rollers before, like Gennady Kvikvinia.
